titles.title: A bill to extend the National Flood Insurance Program through May 31, 2010.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 4/14/2010--Introduced. Amends the Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2010, as amended by the Temporary Extension Act of 2010, to extend the National Flood Insurance Program through May 31, 2010.
